item.title: By: Free Candy For Everyone » Happy World of Warcraft Halloween
item.dc:creator: Free Candy For Everyone » Happy World of Warcraft Halloween
item.description: [...] They’re doing some really fun stuff in WoW for Halloween. There are decorations up all over the place, and you can trick-or-treat at locations to get goodies. Check out the write-up on AFK Gamer for a good description of what all is going on. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] They’re doing some really fun stuff in WoW for Halloween. There are decorations up all over the place, and you can trick-or-treat at locations to get goodies. Check out the write-up on AFK Gamer for a good description of what all is going on. […]

item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description: If you're up to it, go check out the throne room in the ruins of Lordaeron. Now THAT's a hallow's end decoration.
item.content:encoded: If you’re up to it, go check out the throne room in the ruins of Lordaeron. Now THAT’s a hallow’s end decoration.

item.title: By: Brent Michael Krupp
item.dc:creator: Brent Michael Krupp
item.description:
I don't think they changed the name from Halloween to be PC but just to make it feel a bit more Warcraft-y. They changed Christmas to Midwinter Festival or somesuch as well... though obviously anything with Christ in the name definitely doesn't fit WC. Still, I think this was just for flavor.
I agree on it being pretty well done and fun.
item.content:encoded:
I don’t think they changed the name from Halloween to be PC but just to make it feel a bit more Warcraft-y. They changed Christmas to Midwinter Festival or somesuch as well… though obviously anything with Christ in the name definitely doesn’t fit WC. Still, I think this was just for flavor.

I agree on it being pretty well done and fun.

item.title: By: Tyleulen
item.dc:creator: Tyleulen
item.description: I really liked the horde quests that you get from the Wickerman, that have you launching stinkbombs and putting rotten eggs into the beer keg in Southshore. A great idea to spice up the usual SS/TM PvP.
item.content:encoded: I really liked the horde quests that you get from the Wickerman, that have you launching stinkbombs and putting rotten eggs into the beer keg in Southshore. A great idea to spice up the usual SS/TM PvP.

item.title: By: VanHemlock
item.dc:creator: VanHemlock
item.description:
Seeing a zombie wearing a carboard scarey human mask and going 'OoooOOooh' is just wrong on so many levels, and and the Wickerman is something else.
They've certainly put a more effort than is usual for the season in MMOs, bravo!
item.content:encoded:
Seeing a zombie wearing a carboard scarey human mask and going ‘OoooOOooh’ is just wrong on so many levels, and and the Wickerman is something else.

They’ve certainly put a more effort than is usual for the season in MMOs, bravo!

item.title: By: Tara
item.dc:creator: Tara
item.description: I've been like a tourist, snapping screenshots everywhere I go. I actually posed in front of the fountain in Stormwind because there were all these cool candles on it. I spent time getting my character to stand just so, so that I could take a screenshot. Not that anyone is gonna want to see my drag out pictures of my virtual life. Stop me now!!! These Halloween additions are just making it more fun. I love the costumes that you can get at the inns - the ninja one is particularly awesome. Though being a pirate ain't too bad either. Or a giant bat. Yeah. That's fun.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been like a tourist, snapping screenshots everywhere I go. I actually posed in front of the fountain in Stormwind because there were all these cool candles on it. I spent time getting my character to stand just so, so that I could take a screenshot. Not that anyone is gonna want to see my drag out pictures of my virtual life. Stop me now!!! These Halloween additions are just making it more fun. I love the costumes that you can get at the inns – the ninja one is particularly awesome. Though being a pirate ain’t too bad either. Or a giant bat. Yeah. That’s fun.
